articles.author: Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: Having earlier suspended lending services, the crypto giant may be the latest victim of 'crypto contagion.'
articles.title: Genesis Trading Warns of Possible Bankruptcy as Post-FTX Fundraising Falters: Report

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The crypto industry is floundering in the aftermath of FTX’s collapse and the broader market downturn.
articles.title: Coinbase Stock Hits All-Time Low as Bitcoin, Ethereum Decline

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Three senators reiterate warnings to the investment giant, citing problems like “charismatic wunderkinds.”
articles.title: Lawmakers Urge Fidelity to Drop Bitcoin Retirement Plan After FTX Crash

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: A CoinShares report shows that institutional investors are betting against crypto in the wake of the FTX collapse.
articles.title: Investors Are Shorting Bitcoin, Ethereum in Record Numbers

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: FTX Japan is reportedly developing a workaround to allow customers to retrieve their funds.
articles.title: FTX Japan May Resume Withdrawals by December: Report

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The modified video of Sam Bankman-Fried points to an apparent scam website that could potentially steal funds from users.
articles.title: SBF Deepfake Scam Offers Users 'Compensation' for FTX Collapse

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Since FTX filed for bankruptcy on November 11, a growing list of other companies had to disclose their “exposure” to FTX and its related companies FTX US and Alameda Research.
articles.title: What Is Crypto Contagion? How It’s Spreading After FTX Collapse

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The Ethereum creator took aim at members of the Bitcoin community who backed the "not very democratic" regime in El Salvador.
articles.title: Vitalik Buterin: Bitcoin Fans 'Ignored' El Salvador's Undemocratic Government

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The popular decentralized exchange made it clear that it doesn’t collect personal data like names and IP addresses.
articles.title: Uniswap Says It Now Collects Certain Data From Users

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: A family of fintech entrepreneurs claims that the crypto lender froze their accounts and forced them to sell their assets back at a 60% discount.
articles.title: Investors Sue Nexo For Blocking $126 Million in Funds in March 2021

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Sir Jon Cunliffe also praised blockchain tech and confirmed the British approach to crypto will start with stablecoin regulation.
articles.title: Unbacked Exchange Tokens Like FTX’s FTT ‘Extreme Risk’: Bank of England Deputy Governor

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The billionaire founder of Pershing Square revealed that he’s a “small direct investor” in crypto projects including wireless network Helium.
articles.title: Billionaire Bill Ackman Does U-Turn on Crypto, Reveals Helium Investment

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The collapsed crypto lending company Celsius has received a court approval for the bar date on January 3, 2023.
articles.title: Celsius Customers Have Until January to File Claims in Bankruptcy Proceedings

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: The crypto market shed over $30 billion, while Bitcoin and Ethereum posted significant losses amid the contagion from FTX’s collapse.
articles.title: Ethereum Plunges 7% as 'FTX Drainer' Dumps ETH for Bitcoin

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Although names are redacted, a court filing reveals more of the magnitude of the collapse of the exchange.
articles.title: FTX Says It Owes Over $3 Billion to Its 50 Largest Creditors

articles.author: Index Coop
articles.description: In the swirling crypto liquidity storm, DeFi offers a way forward.
articles.title: DeFi Is the Answer to the FTX Crisis—But We Must Get Better at Communicating It

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The company said funds taken from FTX were being transferred to them.
articles.title: FTX Asks Other Exchanges to Help Secure and Return Lost Funds

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The former NSA contractor turned whistleblower criticized the exchange for favoring compliance over its customers' interests.
articles.title: Edward Snowden Calls Coinbase Over-Compliance ‘Toxic and Embarrassing’

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Disgraced former FTX CEO Bankman-Fried posted some cryptic one-letter tweets this week, and deleted others.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Further FTX Fallout

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: While FTX contagion continues, the action on Aave and Uniswap reminds us: DeFi tools continues to work properly, unbothered.
articles.title: Aave and Uniswap Show How DeFi Keeps Working Amid FTX Crisis

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: This week saw continued FTX fallout week as many crypto companies confessed the extent of their exposure to the collapsed empire.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin Avoids Heavy Losses as FTX Contagion Spreads

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Descendants of the late Swedish abstract artist pushed back against the NFT drop, yet the official Hilma af Klint Foundation is onboard.
articles.title: Pharrell’s GODA Completes Hilma af Klint NFT Art Auction Amid Family Complaints

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Elon Musk’s order that employees either become “extremely hardcore” or leave has led to mass resignations.
articles.title: Twitter’s Crypto Engineering Lead Resigns as Staff Numbers Dwindle

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The $17 million transaction was an internal transfer at FalconX, according to a source familiar with the matter.
articles.title: Correction: $17M FalconX Transfer Was Mislabeled as Alameda by Nansen and Etherscan

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: As Ripple continues its battle with the SEC, it’s mostly operating outside of the U.S.—and now wants to set up shop in Ireland.
articles.title: Ripple Eyes Ireland as $1.3 Billion SEC Fight Drags On

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Drake showed off a diamond-encrusted Ledger hardware wallet on his Instagram—but unlike some other rappers, Ledger says he’s not a partner.
articles.title: Bitcoin Bling: Drake Is Latest Rapper to Flex Iced-Out Ledger Wallet

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Coinbase assured clients that it has no exposure to FTX. But the collapse of Sam Bankman-Fried’s exchange is still taking a toll on the entire market.
articles.title: Bank of America Downgrades Coinbase Stock to Neutral, COIN Down 7%

articles.author: Daniel Roberts
articles.description: "Members of the crypto community largely aren't taking this seriously enough," Snowden told the audience at Camp Decrypt.
articles.title: Edward Snowden: Sanctioning of Ethereum Mixer Tornado Cash Was 'Deeply Illiberal and Profoundly Authoritarian'

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The chain swap announcement comes as Solana faces difficulties.
articles.title: Solana Loses $1 Billion in USDT to Ethereum in Tether Chain Swap

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: X2Y2 cited OpenSea’s decision and creator adoption of that rival’s blocklist solution in announcing a change to royalties enforcement.
articles.title: Ethereum NFT Marketplace X2Y2 Will Enforce Royalties Following OpenSea’s 'Brave Move'

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The Luxembourg-based exchange lags many in the industry in shuttering access to the embattled tokens, which still remain actively traded by some.
articles.title: Bitstamp Follows Other Exchanges in Canceling Orders for FTX and Celsius Tokens

articles.description: In an extensive talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Decrypt in Napa CA in October, Edward Snowden gave his candid views on the Ethereum merge, the sanctioning of Ethereum mixer Tornado Cash by the U.S. government, the privacy shortcomings of Bitcoin and Ethereum, and his view on using DAOs to source tips from whistleblowers.
articles.title: Edward Snowden Talks Tornado Cash Sanctions, Ethereum Merge, DAOs and NFTs at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: GBTC is trading at a major discount to Bitcoin, removing the appeal of the prominent investment vehicle.
articles.title: Grayscale’s Bitcoin Trust Hits Record-Low 43% Discount After FTX Crisis

articles.author: ziwang
articles.description: The crypto  lender Genesis paused withdrawals from its lending arm on Wednesday, citing “abnormal withdrawal requests.”
articles.title: Genesis Sought $1B Bailout From Investors Before Halting Withdrawals: Report

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Nearly all of FTX’s sports and esports partners have bolted for the doors as the exchange implodes.
articles.title: Here Are the Sports Marketing Deals Crumbling Along With FTX

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: An FTX filing says the embattled ex-CEO moved assets after declaring bankruptcy, giving the island nation an edge.
articles.title: FTX Bankruptcy Jurisdiction Fight: Bahamas Regulators Now Confirm They Directed SBF to Move Assets

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: While it had no financial exposure to the fallen exchange, Metaplex appears to be suffering from reputational damage spreading to Solana.
articles.title: Solana NFT Protocol Metaplex Announces Layoffs in Wake of FTX Collapse

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: $4 billion in FTT tracked from Alameda to FTX aligns with reports of a loan—using customers funds—from the exchange to the trading desk.
articles.title: FTX Catastrophe Likely Triggered By Terra Collapse: Nansen

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Binance CEO Changpeng “CZ” Zhao says FTX’s Sam Bankman-Fried was never a rival.
articles.title: CZ Says Sam Bankman-Fried Was ‘Badmouthing’ Binance in DC—But They Weren’t in a ‘Battle’

articles.author: Alyssa Hertig
articles.description: Following the epic meltdown of one of the biggest players in crypto, some within the industry are calling for “proof of reserves” to provide greater transparency—but it has its limitations.
articles.title: Proof of Reserves Isn't a 'Panacea' for Future FTX-Like Collapses, Industry Leaders Caution

articles.description: Amid a crypto bear market and recent declines in NFT sales volume, what's the new roadmap for new NFT collections? What's expected by community members and collectors? Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club, Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO, and Eric Feng of NFT block explorer discussed with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Camp Decrypt Napa.
articles.title: The New Landscape for NFT Drops: Bad Grrls Creative Club, BeetsDAO, and Cymbal at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The UK’s Parliamentary Treasury Committee asked Binance for internal correspondence. It received a load of news articles instead.
articles.title: UK Lawmakers Don’t Buy Binance’s Evidence on FTX Collapse

articles.description: Justin Blau aka 3LAU, CEO of Royal, talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about building his company around compliance from the start. "We take compliance so seriously that it might make us move a little bit slower... but we think that's really how we have to build in the space." He also said he looks to Coinbase as a model.
articles.title: Musician 3LAU on His Music NFT Platform Royal: 'We Take Compliance Really Seriously'

articles.description: In less than a week, one of the largest and most trusted crypto exchanges went up in flames, along with its crypto celebrity founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried. Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Kate Irwin walk you through exactly how it happened, what it means for you, their own takes on the most interesting subplots, and what we can learn from it all. Plus: We review some comments SBF and CZ made on this podcast that look remarkable in hindsight. Watch Episode 23 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: FTX Meltdown 101: What the Hell Happened and What Comes Next

articles.description: The Tron founder tells Decrypt about the network's decentralized stablecoin USDD, and how Tron aims to "bridge the Web3 world with the real world.
articles.title: Justin Sun On the Future of Tron's USDD Stablecoin

articles.description: As the unsung heroes of digital connectivity, APIs are the engine under the hood making all the interactivity we’ve come to expect online possible. In video five of the Infura Web3 Dev Series, you’ll learn what blockchain APIs are, how they work, and explore the different types of APIs to improve your dapp’s connectivity. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is A Blockchain API?

articles.description: Rug Radio founder Farokh hosted a lively panel at Camp Decrypt Napa on how DAOs are utilizing NFTs, with panelists Lauren Halstead from Chainlink, Tyson Battistella from Zora, Reza Jafery from PubDAO, and Loxley from Rug Radio's associated RugDAO.
articles.title: When DAOs Meet NFTs: Zora, Chainlink, PubDAO and RugDAO at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Stepn COO Shiti Manghani speaks to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Solana Breakpoint in Lisbon to discuss how the move-to-earn app is weathering the bear market, its partnership with sportswear manufacturer Asics, and creator royalties on NFT marketplaces.
articles.title: How Stepn Plans to Keep Running Through the Bear Market

articles.description: Brave founder and CEO Brendan Eich joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Web Summit 2022 to discuss how the  crypto-powered browser is weathering the bear market—and why Web3 needs to get serious about privacy.
articles.title: Brave CEO Brendan Eich: Web3 Isn't Taking Privacy Seriously Enough

articles.description: Farokh, founder of the DAO-governed NFT media brand Rug Radio, speaks to Mike Kriak of ConsenSys Mesh at Camp Decrypt: Napa. He talked about Rug Radio's origins, tokenization, sponsorship money during the bear market, and why it's called Rug Radio.
articles.title: The View from Rug Radio: Farokh Speaks at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Aave founder Stani Kulechov joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk about his vision for the next iteration of DeFi, Aave V3 and Lens Protocol, the Web3 company he wishes he had founded, and why now is the right time for the $5B lending protocol to launch its GHO stablecoin. Watch Episode 22 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Aave Founder Stani Talks Stablecoins and Next Era of DeFi
